title: 想用RPGitem打开钟表菜单怎么设置，求解
txt_content: 或者说后面跟什么权限，小白一只不是太懂，金粒奉上

replies.author: jiangzizhong
replies.txt_content:
/rpgitem 快捷菜单 create
/rpgitem 快捷菜单 display &b&l快捷菜单
/rpgitem 快捷菜单 hand &2快捷菜单
/rpgitem 快捷菜单 type &c右键使用
/rpgitem 快捷菜单 quality Legendary
/rpgitem 快捷菜单 item 347
/rpgitem 快捷菜单 power command 0 right 'menu' /menu <权限>
复制代码

jiangzizhong 发表于 2016-5-2 14:55
/rpgitem cs power command leftclickair 0 菜单 `cc open zy` chestcommands. 后面权限接什么呢

jiangzizhong 发表于 2016-5-2 15:17
chestcommands.open.*.yml
that play is not oline，可能是不能用，金粒奉上{:10_512:}我自己再去试试
